ch.nolix.nolixCommonLibrary.exception

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.nolixCommonLibrary.exception.Validator

  • public final class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some methods that validates values. That means that the methods throw exceptions if the given values do not fulfill certain conditions.
